imdb.title: Spiral: Suiri no kizuna
imdb.plot: A teen amateur detective must use his amazing powers of logical deduction to learn about the mysterious Blade Children and stop them.

episodes.title: Unmei no rasen
episodes.plot: What are the Blade Children? A question that has plagued Ayumu's mind for two years. But now Ayumu has been accused of attempted murder. Who really pushed the mysterious Sayoko off the ledge? Who is Sonobe and why is he determined to make Ayumu look like the bad guy?

episodes.title: Shi no seijukan
episodes.plot: After Sonobe is mysteriously attacked a murder takes place in Sayoko's home. Leading us further into the questions: What are the Blade Children and is Sayoko really a Blade Child?

episodes.title: Norowareta kodomo tachi
episodes.plot: Eyes Rutherford has skyrocketed to the pinnacle of success, but he holds a dark secret one that could take him down with it. What does Eyes know, and how does he know Kiyotaka?

episodes.title: Shinjiru mono no kôfuku
episodes.plot: Sonobe has wound up dead. Now Ayumu and Hiyono are determined to dig up some dirt on this crime. While searching for the killer they meet the ever cocky Kousuke. There's more to this guy than Ayumu knows: Kousuke is a Blade Child. And if things didn't seem weirder he also knows Kiyotaka!.

episodes.title: Kiri no shikei dai
episodes.plot: The mystery of the Blade Children continues. Mr.Imazato informs Ayumu about the Blade Children. But before he can reveal anything a mysterious person takes away his life. The Blade Children refuse to let anyone stand in the way of their mysterious destiny. The only person that is the key to their salvation is Ayumu.

episodes.title: Hôimô no shikaku
episodes.plot: The mystery of Imazato's murder gets underway. However there's a hidden danger as Hiyono becomes the next target of the Blade Children. Can Ayumu protect Hiyono from certain death? All this and more.

episodes.title: Shinjinu mono no sentaku
episodes.plot: Ayumu has been issued yet another challenge by the Blade Children. A challenge that could most definitely be Ayumu's greatest and deadliest one yet. Meanwhile at the police station Madoka tries to get in to Kiyotaka's file but instead learns that there's a chance that Adachi, Sonobe, and Imazato possibly have something to do with Kiyotaka's mysterious disappearance. Who were these three really and can Ayumu and Hiyono actually defeat the Blade Children once and for all?

episodes.title: Haisha bakari no hi
episodes.plot: After leaving Hiyono in the hands of the Blade Children, Ayumu begins to wonder if all these dangerous games really are worth the chance of Hiyono getting killed. Madoka remembers her promise to Kiyotaka: To always be there for Ayumu no matter what. After which Ayumu returns to the hospital for the chance to save Hiyono. What will Ayumu suggest?

episodes.title: Kimi ni dekiru arayuru koto
episodes.plot: After losing to Rio last time Ayumu makes a comeback. Since each side has something the others want Hiyono and the tape another game is devised. This time by none other than Ayumu. After the game begins Rio rushes off to catch up to Hiyono while Kousuke heads off to intercept the damning tape. When Rio pushes Hiyono onto a train it now seems like certain death for Ayumu. With a bomb around his neck and Hiyono on a moving train however will Ayumu get out of this alive!?

episodes.title: Tatta hitotsu no saeta yarikata
episodes.plot: The game is underway but the victor is still unknown. As Kousuke rushes to intercept the damning tape from Ayumu's control Rio decides to meet Ayumu face to face to see the game to the end.

episodes.title: Guddo naito suîto hâtsu
episodes.plot: Ayumu has finally won the battle. Rio confesses a few things. Once she gets back to the hospital Eyes offers Ayumu a deal.

episodes.title: Kawaita hitomi
episodes.plot: It's Christmas time and the Blade Children receive an ominous warning: The Hunters are coming. Eyes seeks help from an old friend and sends a word of caution to Ayumu. Who are the Hunters and the Blade Children and who are friends and who are foes?

episodes.title: Overture: Jokyoku
episodes.plot: A Hunter has come to assassinate the Blade Children. Eyes, Ayumu and Kousuke become partners. Ayumu might help to save the mysterious leader of the Blade Children. Can they unravel the mysterious assassins' plot before it's too late?

episodes.title: Amaki kaori kagerô ni nite
episodes.plot: Ayumu's got a day off from school which gives him enough time to try and piece together the mystery of the Blade Children. With extreme reluctance Ayumu is intrigued with the recent events leading up to the Blade Children. As they go back through the school year, the story of Spiral begins to come closer together.

episodes.title: Raiku a suwan
episodes.plot: The Hunters grow more and more desperate to annihilate the Blade Children. As if that wasn't all, a high stakes game pits an old friend of Eyes' and Eyes himself against each other. Rutherford prepares to strengthen his defenses against the Hunters.

episodes.title: Manekazaru hômonsha
episodes.plot: A transfer student comes to the Academy and much to the dismay of Ayumu, it's Kousuke. But it's all forgotten when Ayumu discovers Hiyono and Rio have been kidnapped by the Hunters. Now, it's up to Ayumu, Kousuke, and Ryoko to save them.

episodes.title: Kurayami no kyasunâ
episodes.plot: Ayumu, Ryoko, and Kousuke enter the abandoned hospital where Hiyono and Rio are being held. But the Hunters have traps set up on each and every floor. Will this trio save the girls before it's too late?

episodes.title: Nageki no tenshi
episodes.plot: Rio and Hiyono are safe for now after the kidnapping. After which all seems well until Kanone shows up in Japan, which is a surprise to Ayumu. Before Ayumu can soak in the consequences of Kanone's arrival, Sayoko becomes more involved than ever.

episodes.title: Kokoro no kagami
episodes.plot: A Hunter has his eyes set on a different target: Sayoko. Can Ayumu and Eyes save Sayoko, and disarm the bomb in time before the Blade Children suffer an agonizing defeat?

episodes.title: Sasayaku kage
episodes.plot: Kousuke makes the dumbest decision of his life: taking on a Hunter face to face. Will Kousuke be killed or can he be saved by Ayumu?

episodes.title: Kokoro no kudakeru oto
episodes.plot: Ayumu must face his most powerful enemy yet; someone he'd least suspect. The Blade Children plan an attack against the Hunters. And Madoka has encountered someone from the past, who's got intentions that are far worse than death.

episodes.title: Kamen no kokuhaku
episodes.plot: The final showdown between the Blade Children and the Hunters is underway. A Hunter is on the police force and a betrayer in the Blade Children's midst. Who are these two, and can the Hunters' assassination attempts pay off at last?

episodes.title: Tomanai ame
episodes.plot: Finally a link for the missing Kiyotaka presents itself: a kidnapper. Ayumu also has to find Madoka before it's too late. But the Blade Children are sinking deeper and deeper into peril. Will Ayumu be able to save them before it's too late?

episodes.title: Takai shiro no otoko
episodes.plot: Madoka is being held captive by Kanone. Ayumu has to pass three tests to bring his sister-in-law to safety. From a train then to a boat and finally a warehouse filled with fireworks, and into the hands of Kanone.

episodes.title: Ayame no ite toku oto
episodes.plot: The final battle between Ayumu and Kanone takes place. Will Ayumu defeat Kanone and find happiness in himself?
